section.p: The elements in the user interface domain each have a specific semantic purpose.

dlentry.dd:
user interface control
Example: Click File and select New to launch the New project dialog

window title
Example: Click File New to launch the New project dialog

menu cascade
Example: Click File New to launch the New project dialog

shortcut
Example: Click File New to launch the New project dialog. Alternatively press Ctrl+Nkeys
